ComicInfo.Summary:
The finale is here! Gargos is back, and while the Shadow Lord may be vulnerable, he is far from defenseless. Kim Wu and her fellow heroes race against time to defeat this monstrous foe.
Meanwhile, ARIA and the Tsar have formed an unholy alliance, and are ready to slay whoever survives this Astral showdown.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Yildiray Cinar & Jorge Sutil | 1 | B | Cover B | Alvaro Sarraseca & Jordi Escuin Llorach | 2 | C | Subscription Cover C | Cam Adams & Jorge Sutil | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Alvaro Sarraseca | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Yildiray Cinar | 5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 20:09:23. [CVDB664938]

ComicInfo.Editor: Anthony Marques, Joseph Rybandt, Kevin Ketner, Matt Idelson
ComicInfo.Characters: Aganos, Great Tiger Spirit, Jago, Kan-Ra, Kim Wu, True Tsar, Tusk
